【 STRONG MAGNETIC SCREWDRIVER】 Strong magnetic can keep the screws from dropping, and fixed the position of screw, in case of over drilling.
【 BENDABLE EXTENSION CABLE】 This cable can be bent, twisted and rotated at many different angles. It can be drilled into a small space, in a variety of gaps, rather than your hand, flexible installation work. Let this flexible drill bit extension tool help you solve more problems quickly.

Product Description

2023-2024 Desk Calendar – 18 Months Large Monthly Desk Calendar, 17″x 12″ , Janaury 2023-June 2023

Advantage of 2023-2024 desk calendar

18 months from Janaury 2023- June 2024 are covered.Premium paper is ink-proof and avoids feathering.Can be used as a desk calendar or a wall calendarPages size: 17″ x 12″.Pages color: 6 fashion elements, very beautiful

Detailed introduction introduction of the 2023-2024 desk calendar page

Julian DatesHolidays ReminderAmple Ruled Writing Blocks 1.8″ x 2″Referencing Calendar for 18 MonthsNotes Section

Rich colors

Reject boring and monotonous, add richer colors to life.

2 Hanging holes

It can be used as a wall calendar or a desk calendar, suitable for living room, classroom, office.

Two corner protectors

2 clear corner protector efficiently reduce dog-eared pages and make the desk calendar pages easily manageable, avoid curling.

High-quality thick paper

Prevent ink seepage and scratch resistance, which will provide you a smooth writing experience. Moreover, the perforated pages of the desk calendar can be used for easy removal.

Improve time management skills

Recording what needs to be done on the desk calendar 2023-2024 can be a good reminder

MONTHLY OVERVIEW – 18 months desk calendar covers from Jan. 2023 – Jun. 2024. Monthly overview in every page (17″ x 12″), can plan a better future life. Julian dates and highlighting help remind you of every important day.
SUFFICIENT LINED BLOCKS – This desk calendar 2023-2024 offers you the large, ruled daily blocks, so the important things can be recorded on this desk calendar to remind you of them. Each month features daily block( 1.8″ x 2″) with Julian dates and holidays.And it also contains the notes section, you can record some extra content.
HIGH QUALITY THICK PAPER -The paper of this 2023-2024 desk calendar is thick enough to resist the damage of light and air. Prevent ink seepage and scratch resistance, which will provide you a smooth writing experience. Moreover, the perforated pages of the desk calendar can be used for easy removal.
EXCELLENT DESIGN – The desk calendar/wall calendar has rich colors and 6 different page designs, rejecting monotony and bringing more fun to life. In addition, two transparent corners can keep the page flat and prevent paper curling, and two hanging holes can also turn the desk calendar into a wall calendar.
MAKES YOUR LIFE EFFECTIVE – You can write down the things you need to deal with in your life in this 2023-2024 calendar to track your daily to-do list to remind you of tasks and promote them to be completed in the near future. It can also be used to mark important holidays and appointments. This desk calendar is a great life assistant.

BooQool

Product Description

EACHPAI Floating Corner Shelves Wall Mount Set of 4

Enhance any dull corners in your home with our set of 4 rustic floating shelves. Mount the decorative shelves in your living room and display some potted plants, books or collectibles on it. Place storage shelves in your kitchen, and use it to organize your condiments, mason jars, herbs or cooking ingredients. You can even have the hanging shelve in your bathroom, where it will hold your night creams and small towels. Just use your own imagination!

For Bathroom

For Kitchen

For Bedroom

Solid Wood

Made of high-quality paulownia wood, lightweight yet solid with clear texture and the unique handcraft creates a retro style.

Stable Triangular Bracket

The brackets are made of high-quality steel, the triangular design and the elegant matte black finish ensure the shelves stable and fit anywhere in your room.

What’s Included:

4 × wooden boards 8 × triangular metal brackets 20 × big screws 20 × dry wall anchors 20 × small screws 1 × instruction manual

Creative Corner Shelves: Perfect combination of floating and corner shelves.You can make full use of the blank corners and turnings in your room to increase more storage space and make your room neat and organized.
Multifunctional Storage Shelves: Comes with 4 pieces shelves, dimension: 16*11.4inch. Perfect for displaying and holding collectibles, small plants, photo frames, books, etc. Can be used in bedroom, living room, bathroom, kitchen, office and more.
Easy to Install: All the needed tools and detailed intallation guide are in the package, just follow the simple instruction to install the hanging shelves in a few minutes. Any questions or problems, just contact us via Amazon and we always get your back.
Sturdy Wood Shelves: Made of high quality paulownia wood, these shelves are lightweight yet sturdy enough to hold your favorite items. They won’t add too much burden to the wall but per shelf has a max load-bearing capacity of 40lbs.
Rustic Wall Shelves: Torched wood finish and curve design for board and matte finish metal bracket features a carbonized black accent, which will be a great rustic addition to your wall.

Place storage shelves in your kitchen, and use it to organize your condiments, mason jars, herbs or cooking ingredients. You can even have the hanging shelve in your bathroom, where it will hold your night creams and small towels. Just use your own imagination!
